name: typed-function
author: Jos de Jong <wjosdejong@gmail.com> (https://github.com/josdejong)
comment: brace-expansion is installed because an old insecure version is used by one of the dev depencencies (under istanbul)

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && rm -f dist/* && cat typed-function.js | tee dist/typed-function.esm.js | node toUmd.js typedFunction | tee ./dist/typed-function.js | uglifyjs -o dist/typed-function.min.js -c -m
scripts.coverage:
npm run build && istanbul cover _mocha -- test --recursive; echo "
Coverage report is available at ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html"
